title: "no transaction is in progress" in @Transactional service method
body:
### Describe the bug

In a Quarkus 2.7.4 application running in non-native mode I have the following service:
```java
@ApplicationScoped
public class TestService {
    @Inject
    @Channel("channel-out")
    Emitter<Long> emitter;

    public void test() {
        MyEntity entity = new MyEntity();
        entity.id = 1L;
        entity.field = "Test";
        entity.persist();

        emitter.send(5L);
    }
}
```

### Expected behavior

`@Transactional` methods should never throw "no transaction is in progress".

### How to Reproduce?

Here is a reproducer: [issue-21948.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/8255657/issue-21948.zip)
Running the JUnit is enough to trigger the error.

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK 17

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.7.4

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.6.3
